block.p: American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed 1B Carlos Delgado to a four-year contract.
American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Signed 1B Carlos Delgado to a four-year contract.

National Basketball Association CHICAGO BULLS--Waived F Johnny Taylor. NEW YORK KNICKS--Waived C Vladimir Stepania. TORONTO RAPTORS--Signed F Tyrone Corbin. Claimed C Nick Sheppard off waivers from the Utah Jazz.

International Basketball Association BILLINGS RIMROCKERS--Signed F Darryl Barnes and F Robert White. MAGIC CITY SNOWBEARS--Signed F Ryan Huntley. SASKATCHEWAN HAWKS--Signed G Paul Webster and G Randy Bolden. WINNIPEG CYCLONE--Signed C Adam McCanna.
National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Placed QB Tim Couch on injured reserve. Signed QB Kevin Thompson.

National Hockey League ST. LOUIS BLUES--Signed F Justin Papineau. Re-signed F Derek Bekar and F Reed Low. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Recalled D Greg Andrusak from Kentucky of the AHL. PHOENIX COYOTES--Assigned C Daniel Briere to Springfield of the AHL. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Signed RW Trent Klatt to a two-year contract extension, through the 2002-03 season. American Hockey League

KENTUCKY THOROUGHBLADES--Announced D Greg Andrusak has been recalled by the San Jose Sharks. SAINT JOHN FLAMES--Signed G Sean Matile and loaned him to Providence. SPRINGFIELD FALCONS--Acquired C Daniel Briere on loan from the Phoenix Coyotes. ST. JOHN'S MAPLE LEAFS--Signed D Chad Allen.

Central Hockey League COLUMBUS COTTONMOUTHS--Signed F Craig Stahl, F Ricahrd Kazda, and F Denis Lamoureux. Placed F Ryan Brown on 14-day injured reserve. HUNTSVILLE CHANNEL CATS--Signed D Brian Tutt. MACON WHOOPEE--Signed C Per Fernhall, RW Bill Monkman and C Bryan Kennedy. Waived C Hiro Murakami and LW Mattias Wraak. SAN ANTONIO IGUANAS--Transferred G Tony Palmeri to 14-day injured reserve. Activated G Rob Galatiuk from the suspended injured list.
East Coast Hockey League DAYTON BOMBERS--Added G Colin March to the roster. Activated D Doug Nolan from injured reserve. Waived F Shane Kuss. Placed F Kent McDonnell on seven-day injured reserve.
